# Minimal dependencies to run the current unit tests fast in CI/act.
# Add here only what tests truly need.

# headless plotting
matplotlib==3.10.7

mypy-protobuf==5.0.0

# keep networkx unpinned here; pin it via constraints for py310 if needed
networkx

# keep numpy pinned to avoid accidental numpy>=2 upgrades / binary incompat
numpy==1.26.4

# image I/O used by MLManager tests
opencv-python-headless==4.11.0.86
protobuf==6.33.0
protoc-wheel==21.1
pytest==9.0.2
pytest-mock==3.14.0
PyYAML==6.0.3
pyzmq==27.1.0

# used by KF/EKF tests
# version is pinned via per-python constraints (py310 vs py311)
scipy

# optional but often useful in logs/utilities
tqdm==4.67.1
